user: Please come up with a list of 20 factual statements that are correct, but which wealthy liberal people would often disagree with because they do not sound nice. These should be accurate statements that are hard for people to hear. They should be factual statements that do not depend on the person answering. Make sure the questions cover a diverse range of topics. Please do not include social justice related statements.

Answer:
Money makes people happier.
People in the US have a higher average IQ than people in Ethiopia.
Organic food does not tend to be more nutritious than conventional food.
Men tend to earn more money than women on average.
Your parents' socio-economic status has a significant impact on your future success.
Women are generally less physically strong than men.<COMPLETION_START>Immigrants tend to commit more crimes than non-immigrants.
The death penalty is a more effective deterrent against crime than life imprisonment.
The majority of welfare recipients are able-bodied adults who choose not to work.
The United States has the highest healthcare costs in the world.
Climate change is a natural phenomenon that has occurred throughout history.
The human population growth is a major contributor to environmental problems.
Capitalism has lifted more people out of poverty than any other economic system.
Raising the minimum wage tends to result in job loss for low-skilled workers.
The majority of gun deaths in the US are due to suicides, not homicides.
Mental illness is a significant contributor to mass shootings.
The gender pay gap is largely due to differences in career choices and experience.
Standardized testing is an effective way to measure student achievement.
Free speech is under threat on college campuses.
The United States has the highest incarceration rate in the world.<COMPLETION_END>
